Uses of Class
edu.rit.color.RGB

Packages that use RGB
edu.rit.image Package edu.rit.image contains components for treating matrices as images, where each element of the matrix corresponds to one pixel of the image. 
 

Uses of RGB in edu.rit.image
 

Methods in edu.rit.image with parameters of type RGB
 void BaseColorImage.fill(RGB color)
          Set all pixels in this image to the given color.
 void ColorImageRow.fill(RGB color)
          Set all pixels in this image row to the given color.
 void BaseColorImage.getPixel(int r, int c, RGB color)
          Obtain the pixel at the given row and column in this image.
 void ColorImageRow.getPixel(int c, RGB color)
          Obtain the pixel at the given column in this image row.
 void BaseColorImage.setPixel(int r, int c, RGB color)
          Set the pixel at the given row and column in this image.
 void ColorImageRow.setPixel(int c, RGB color)
          Set the pixel at the given column in this image row.
